tasks.task: Inspect tomato plants for early blight
subtasks: Observe the condition of tomato leaves and stems
Recognize symptoms of early blight (brown, dry spots)
Remove affected tomatoes to prevent disease spread
Apply copper fungicide to treated plants

tasks.task: Ensure proper spacing and airflow for tomato plants
subtasks: Adjust plant spacing for adequate separation
Improve air circulation around tomato plants

tasks.task: Respond to unrelated cookie consumption ("Pleaseam nugget")

subtasks: Note mention of non-agricultural products and brands
